subject: Women and Girls
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Women’s ski jumping will be included in the inaugural Winter Youth Olympics in 2012 and has a “very strong case” to be part of future Olympics, said Jacques Rogge, the president of the International Olympic Committee.
snippet: Women’s ski jumping will be included in the inaugural Winter Youth Olympics in 2012 and has a “very strong case” to be part of future Olympics, said Jacques Rogge, the president of the International Olympic Committee.
